items.sentence: Tom meant it as a joke, but no one was amused.
Tom mentioned that it was about time to leave.
Tom must be very happy after winning the race.
Do you think they\'ll know we\'re from Boston?
I saw something on the other side of the room.
I should tell Tom what you and I did together.
I parked on the street in front of your house.
I asked Tom not to wear his sister\'s clothes.
If you find a mistake, please leave a comment.
If you should meet a bear, pretend to be dead.
